roleset.name: urinate

example.name: misdemeanor
example.text: I 've got a quarter of a million Germans in my state , and those krautheads tune in on Father Werther every night , and if he tells them-2 [*-2] to go out and piss in the public square , that 's what they do [*T*-1] .

roleset.note: Framed by Ben. Frames file for 'piss' based on sentences in brown.

roleset.name: anger: non-phrasal

role.descr: additional reason for anger, if in addition to arg0

example.name: args 0, 1, 3
example.text: But the far right sees it and it pisses the hell out of them .

example.name: all args
example.text: He was a bright spark, but pissed the hell out of him with all his nervousness, especially after yelling about his poxy iPhone all those months
example.arg: especially after yelling about his poxy iPhone all those months

example.name: args 0, 1, 2
example.text: Maybe he-1 was pissed *-1 at him for not letting enough air out of the balls.
example.arg: for not letting enough air out of the balls

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls..

roleset.name: Angry
roleset.note: Based on sentneces in call home-1. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie.

example.name: adjectival rel: po'ed
example.text: So while normally , I would have been a tad po'ed at a 15 % increase in one year , I started laughing .
example.arg: at a 15% increas in one year

example.name: all args
example.text: 'Cause Romney pissed him off with the Jeep-China lie.
